snippet: The United States military has halted ground shipments of cargo leaving Afghanistan via a key supply route through Pakistan to ensure the safety of drivers.
abstract: United States military halts ground shipments of cargo leaving Afghanistan via a key supply route through Pakistan to ensure safety of drivers after protests in Pakistan over American drone strikes.
lead_paragraph: The United States military has halted ground shipments of cargo leaving Afghanistan via a key supply route through Pakistan to ensure the safety of drivers.

headline.main: Pakistan: U.S. Shuts Cargo Routes From Afghanistan Over Drone Protests
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: U.S. Shuts Cargo Routes From Afghanistan Over Drone Protests

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
